dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, everything's, like, super calm on the currency markets today, right? Nothing really happening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, everything's, like, super calm on the currency markets today, right? Nothing really happening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! Oh my gosh, actually, the complete opposite! Have you seen what's happening with the dollar, um, in Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! Oh my gosh, actually, the complete opposite! Have you seen what's happening with the dollar, um, in Kazakhstan?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan? Wait, really? I thought, like, it was just cruising. What's, uh, what's going on there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan? Wait, really? I thought, like, it was just cruising. What's, uh, what's going on there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's strengthening, um, like crazy! Because of, get this, global oil prices dropping.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's strengthening, um, like crazy! Because of, get this, global oil prices dropping.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The US dollar has strengthened in exchange offices across Kazakhstan amid a decline in global oil prices.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oil prices? Oh, wow. So, like, the dollar is just soaring then? Give me, uh, give me numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oil prices? Oh, wow. So, like, the dollar is just soaring then? Give me, uh, give me numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! In Astana, it's selling for, like, 512 tenge now. It was, what, 507 just the day before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! In Astana, it's selling for, like, five hundred twelve tenge now. It was, what, five hundred seven just the day before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of 4:50 P.M., the dollar is being sold for 512 tenge and bought for 505 tenge in Astana exchange offices. On April 3, the dollar was sold at an average rate of 507 tenge and bought for 501 tenge in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five twelve! That's, uh, a pretty big jump! And Almaty, I bet that's, like, similar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five twelve! That's, uh, a pretty big jump! And Almaty, I bet that's, like, similar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Almaty's, um, selling for 510, but the buying rate, oh my gosh, 509 tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Almaty's, um, selling for five hundred ten, but the buying rate, oh my gosh, five hundred nine tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Almaty, the selling rate is 510 tenge, while the buying rate stands at 509 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five hundred and nine! That's, uh, way up from, like, 501 just recently, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five hundred and nine! That's, uh, way up from, like, five hundred one just recently, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Almaty, exchange offices offered the dollar for 504 tenge and bought it for 501 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the KASE, um, their weighted average for the day? 504.34! Up 2.79 tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the K A S E, um, their weighted average for the day? five hundred four point three four! Up two point seven nine tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average exchange rate for the US dollar during daytime trading on April 4 was 504.34 tenge, marking an increase of 2.79 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Almost three tenge in, like, one day? That's, uh, a significant move for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almost three tenge in, like, one day? That's, uh, a significant move for sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's, um, a major shift. The National Bank's official rate is even up to 501.57.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's, um, a major shift. The National Bank's official rate is even up to five hundred one point five seven.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official exchange rate set by the National Bank for April 4 is 501.57 tenge per dollar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild. So, all because, uh, oil prices decided to take a dive?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild. So, all because, uh, oil prices decided to take a dive?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, the big, big driver. It's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, the big, big driver. It's wild.
